name: Orbital Defense (Tico0001)
description:
Orbital Defense is an arcade style, "educational" game where you destroy asteroids to save the Earth. But the only way to move around is with (mostly) realistic orbital maneuvers. I drew lots of inspiration from Kerbal Space Program, Asteroids, Space War, Gyruss and Orbt XL.

Note:  the game is optimized to use a game pad. Keyboard controls are NOT supported.
